name: Autem Diabolicum
description:
Control System

[Arrow Keys]: move.

[X]: continue.

[R]: restart.

[Z]: undo.

What is this?

Push the Will-o'-the-Wisps to align them to solve the puzzle.

I wrote a few words about this game on my company's blog, read them here: http://urustar.net/blog/puzzlescript-a-perfect-app...

Donations will be strictly used to provide me food.

Hope you either enjoy or hate it!
